nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze

Interface ModelAccessObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChapsModelImpl

    public interface ModelAccessObject
    An access object for the model. Used by maze objects to create side effects. method is given all variables storing the board state they are then modified within other classes and returned after being processed within class and update the ChapsModelImpl to reflect these changes
